de.holisticon.annotationprocessortoolkit.validators

Class FluentElementValidator<T extends Element>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.holisticon.annotationprocessortoolkit.validators.AbstractFluentValidator<FluentModifierElementValidator,T>
      • de.holisticon.annotationprocessortoolkit.validators.FluentElementValidator<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - 

    public abstract class FluentElementValidator<T extends Element>
extends AbstractFluentValidator<FluentModifierElementValidator,T>
    Fluent validator utility class to validator lists of Elements. Each validator operation produces a FluentElementValidator instance.
